subject: Haptique srp moza
description_text:
Hi,
I would like to know if you have a complete vibration kit for SRP MOZA please
Best regards
Thierry

Obtenir Outlook pour Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi Thierry Andrea,    You can buy the VAM Pro Set to use with the control box, but the complimentary adaptive mounts shouldn't work, you'll need to 3d print an additional set of mounts.
